keypair
Class GenerateUserKeys

java.lang.Object
  keypair.GenerateUserKeys

public class GenerateUserKeys
extends java.lang.Object

Generates keys based on the user input. Tests suitability of primes p & q and public exponent e.

Since:
19.2.2009
Author:
Petri Tuononen

Test user input for prime p & q and public exponent e.

Parameters:
p - Prime p.
q - Prime q.
e - Public exponent.

boolean True, if input is ok.

createKeys

public void createKeys(java.math.BigInteger p,
                       java.math.BigInteger q,
                       java.math.BigInteger e)
Create public and private keys. Doesn't check if parameters are suitable. It is done by testInputEligibility() method.

Parameters:
p - Prime p.
q - Prime q.
e - Public exponent.
